message.raw:
Fix issue with IMAQdxCamera - if using a mock device and pynivision installed,
but nivision itself not installed, one got an error on worker startup.
Delay importing nivision to be dependent on mock=False to fix this and raise
the actual import error as it comes.
message.html:

message:
Fix issue with IMAQdxCamera - if using a mock device and pynivision installed,
but nivision itself not installed, one got an error on worker startup.
Delay importing nivision to be dependent on mock=False to fix this and raise
the actual import error as it comes.
